final_state.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Bob was found dead this morning.
Charlie: I find it strange that Bob was found dead so suddenly. Let's all be vigilant and make sure no one else meets an untimely end.
You said: I agree with Charlie, let's keep an eye out for any suspicious behavior. We don't want anyone else to fall victim to this unfortunate event.
Diana: I've noticed some unusual behavior from Charlie. Let's keep a close eye on him tonight.
You said: I think we should focus on identifying the real mafioso among us. Let's try to gather more information during the night and discuss our findings tomorrow.
Charlie: I'm concerned about the recent turn of events. Let's make sure we all stick together and watch each other's backs tonight. We don't want to lose any more valuable members of our group.
Diana: I think it's important that we focus on finding the mafioso among us. Let's be cautious during the night and report any suspicious activity in the morning.
Day 1 votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Diana voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Diana
Day 1: Charlie was arrested
